titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to include Kentucky among the States which may divide their retirement systems into two parts so as to obtain Social Security coverage, under State agreement, for only those State and local employees who desire such coverage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/5/2002--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to include Kentucky among the States that may divide their retirement systems into two parts to obtain Social Security coverage, under State agreement, for only those State and local employees who desire such coverage.
